faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Do you have any questions? Don't worry, we are here to help! Read our frequently asked questions. If your question hasn't been addressed, simply leave it, and we will answer you as soon as possible.

quest.title: Your Question
quest.placeholder: Write your question and we will answer it

quest1.title: How to choose the right paint color?
quest1.answer: To choose a paint color, we recommend using our color palettes and online consultation. You can also order color samples to evaluate them under real lighting conditions in your room.

quest2.title: What surfaces can be painted with Remalux paints?
quest2.answer: Our paints are suitable for painting walls, ceilings, doors, furniture, metal, and wooden surfaces.

quest3.title: How long does it take for the paint to dry completely?
quest3.answer: The drying time of the paint depends on the room's temperature and humidity. Typically, the paint dries within 2-3 hours.

quest4.title: Are Remalux paints environmentally friendly?
quest4.answer: Yes, all Remalux paints are water-based and do not contain harmful substances.

quest5.title: Can I apply the paint myself, or do I need a specialist?
quest5.answer: Our paints are easy to apply on your own. You will need a brush, roller, and painter's tape.

quest6.title: Where can I buy Remalux products?
quest6.answer: You can purchase Remalux paints in our partner stores or order them on our website.

newsletter.title: Join Our Newsletter
newsletter.description: Stay up to date on trends and decorating ideas with our new monthly newsletter.

partnership.history_description: Remalux was founded over 30 years ago with a simple mission — to offer the highest quality paints that inspire the creation of unique and durable projects. Since then, we have come a long way: from a small factory to an industry leader known for innovation and responsible manufacturing.
partnership.title: Create Bright Projects with Remalux
partnership.description: Welcome to Remalux! We are a leading manufacturer of high-quality paints, known for their variety of shades and durability. Join our team of partners and create bright and durable coatings for the most daring projects with us.
partnership.history_1990: Remalux opened its doors with the goal of creating paints that inspire and transform the world around us.
partnership.history_1995: We introduced our first line of interior paints, quickly gaining customer trust with high quality and a wide range of shades.
partnership.history_2000: We began using new manufacturing technologies, significantly increasing the durability and eco-friendliness of our products.
partnership.history_2010: Remalux expanded its presence across the country, offering products in major retail chains and specialty stores.
partnership.history_2015: We launched an export program, entering international markets and starting partnerships worldwide.
partnership.history_2023: We opened a modern production complex, increasing our capacity and expanding our product range to better meet customer needs.
partnership.branches_description: Remlux has 6 branches in all major cities of Kazakhstan with its head office located in Almaty.
partnership.news_title: Stay Up to Date with All News
partnership.news_description: Want to be the first to know about new products, promotions, and inspiring projects? Subscribe to our Instagram! Stay updated, find ideas for your projects, and keep up with all the Remalux news. Join our online family and become part of the world of bright colors and creative solutions!
partnership.application_form_description: Want to become a Remalux partner and offer our customers the best paints? Fill out the application, and our manager will contact you to discuss the terms of cooperation and answer all your questions.

partners.title: Become a Partner
partners.text: Are you looking for a reliable partner in the paint sales industry? Join us! We offer high-quality products, favorable partnership conditions, and support at all stages. Be part of a successful business and reach new heights with us! Contact us to discuss all the details of the partnership.

hero_section.title: K-COLOR LLP under the REMALUX brand – High European quality at an affordable price.
hero_section.description: K-COLOR LLP under the REMALUX brand is a leader in the production of paints and coatings, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan. We offer a wide range of high-quality paints manufactured under a British license from raw materials from renowned French, Belgian, German, Dutch, and American producers.

why_choose_us.title: Why do customers choose our products?
why_choose_us.description: Our paints are trusted thanks to their high quality, innovative solutions, and economical consumption. Add to this favorable prices and a wide range, and you'll understand why they choose us again.

quality.title: High Quality
quality.description: Our paints undergo strict quality control, providing excellent coverage and durability on any surface.

innovation.title: Innovative Manufacturing Technologies
innovation.description: We use advanced technologies to create paints that are easy to apply, quick to dry, and provide rich colors.

economy.title: Economical Material Consumption
economy.description: Our paints provide high coverage, allowing you to reduce consumption and cut costs.

price.title: Competitive Prices
price.description: We offer excellent value for money so that you can get a professional product at an affordable cost.

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: In our range, you will find paints for any need – from interior to industrial coatings, in a variety of colors and textures.

for_whom.title: Who is our company's products intended for?
for_whom.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the requirements of the most demanding professionals for use on prestigious, high-profile projects. Additionally, they are perfect for everyday people selecting materials for home use and carrying out DIY cosmetic repairs.

remalux_section.title: REMALUX: Everything You Need for a Perfect Result
remalux_section.description: REMALUX offers high-quality paints with modern technologies and excellent service. All products are safe and meet European standards.

innovation.title: Innovative Technologies and Modern Production Methods
innovation.description: The production of paints at REMALUX is based on modern technologies and achievements in chemical science, guaranteeing high quality and safety at competitive prices.

service.title: Service
service.description: We provide after-purchase service, meeting customer requirements through high product quality and excellent service.

assortment.title: Wide Product Range
assortment.description: REMALUX offers textured coatings, emulsion paints, varnishes, acrylic glue, and other materials. We will help you choose the right shade and guarantee high quality at competitive prices.

safety.title: Safety and Comfort in Use
safety.description: Water-based products are non-toxic and odorless, ensuring comfortable use for both professionals and DIY enthusiasts. Our paints are safe for people and pets.

our_fleet.title: Our Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
our_fleet.description: Our products are designed to easily meet the requirements of the most demanding professionals for use on prestigious, high-profile projects. Additionally, they are perfect for everyday people selecting materials for home use and carrying out DIY cosmetic repairs.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: The Privacy Policy (hereinafter referred to as the Policy) applies to personal data that K-COLOR LLP (hereinafter referred to as LLP) may receive from the user when visiting the site https://remalux.kz (hereinafter referred to as the Site) and using its services, as well as explains how personal data processing and protection will be carried out.

terms.title: 1. DEFINITION OF TERMS
terms.admin: Site Administration (hereinafter referred to as Administration) – authorized employees...
terms.personal_data: Personal data - any information related to a directly or indirectly identifiable person...
terms.data_processing: Processing of personal data - any action (operation) or set of actions...
terms.confidentiality: Confidentiality of personal data - mandatory compliance...
terms.site: The remalux.kz online store website (hereinafter referred to as the Site) is a collection of interrelated web pages...
terms.user: User of the website (hereinafter referred to as the User) – a person who has access to the website...
terms.cookies: Cookies — a small data fragment sent by the web server and stored on the user's computer...
terms.ip_address: IP address — a unique network address of a node in a computer network through which the User accesses...
terms.product: Product - an item ordered by the User on the website and paid for through payment systems.

general.title: 2. GENERAL PROVISIONS
general.usage: Using the remalux.kz online store website by the User signifies agreement with this Privacy Policy...
general.disagreement: If the User disagrees with the terms of the Privacy Policy, they must cease using the Site.
general.application: This Privacy Policy applies to the website owned by K-COLOR LLP...
general.verification: The Administration does not verify the accuracy of personal data provided by the User.

subject.title: 3. SUBJECT OF THE PRIVACY POLICY
subject.obligations: This Privacy Policy establishes the obligations of the Administration regarding non-disclosure...
subject.data: Personal data allowed for processing under this Privacy Policy...
subject.ssl: The online store uses a certified SSL encryption key for data transmission over the HTTPS protocol...
subject.cookies: Disabling cookies may result in the inability to access parts of the website that require authorization.
subject.other_info: Any other personal information not mentioned above is subject to secure storage and non-disclosure...

purposes.title: 4. PURPOSES OF COLLECTING USER PERSONAL INFORMATION
purposes.identification: Identifying the User registered on the Website for further authorization...
purposes.access: Providing the User with access to personalized data on the Website.
purposes.feedback: Establishing feedback with the User, including notifications...
purposes.location: Determining the User's location to ensure security, prevent fraud...

processing.title: 5. METHODS AND TERMS OF PERSONAL DATA PROCESSING
processing.methods: The processing of the User's personal data is carried out without time limit, by any legal means...
processing.third_parties: The User agrees that the Administration has the right to transfer personal data to third parties...
processing.government: The User's personal data may be transferred to authorized government bodies of the Republic of Kazakhstan...
processing.loss: In the event of loss or disclosure of personal data, the Administration has the right not to inform the User...
processing.measures: The Administration takes the necessary organizational and technical measures to protect the User's personal information...
processing.cooperation: The Administration, together with the User, takes all necessary measures to prevent losses or other negative consequences...

rights.title: 6. RIGHTS AND OBLIGATIONS OF THE PARTIES
rights.decision: The User has the right to make a free decision to provide their personal data...
rights.information: The User has the right to obtain information from the Administration regarding the processing of their personal data...
rights.use: The Administration is obliged to use the received information solely for the purposes specified in paragraph 4 of this Privacy Policy...
rights.confidentiality: The Administration is obliged to ensure the storage of confidential information in secrecy, not to disclose it without the prior written consent of the User...
rights.blocking: The Administration is obliged to block the User's personal data from the moment of the User's request or request...

responsibilities.title: 7. RESPONSIBILITIES OF THE PARTIES
responsibilities.loss: The Administration, failing to fulfill its obligations, is liable for the losses incurred by the User...
responsibilities.disclosure: The Administration is not responsible in case of loss or disclosure of confidential information if this information...
responsibilities.law: The User is fully responsible for complying with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan...
responsibilities.deletion: The Administration is not responsible to the User for any loss or damage incurred by the User as a result of the deletion...
responsibilities.usage: The Administration is not responsible for any direct or indirect losses resulting from the use or inability to use the Website...

disputes.title: 8. DISPUTE RESOLUTION
disputes.pre_court: Before filing a lawsuit regarding disputes arising between the User and the Administration...
disputes.notification: The recipient of the claim, within 20 calendar days from the date of receipt of the claim, must inform the claimant in writing or electronically...
disputes.arbitration: In the absence of an agreement, the dispute will be submitted to the Arbitration Court of Almaty.
disputes.law: This Privacy Policy and the relationship between the User and the Administration are governed by the current legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

additional.title: 9. ADDITIONAL CONDITIONS
additional.changes: The Administration reserves the right to make changes to this Privacy Policy without the User's consent.
additional.effective_date: The new Privacy Policy comes into force from the moment it is posted on the Website unless otherwise provided by the new version of the Privacy Policy.

payment_delivery.title: METHODS AND COST OF DELIVERY
payment_delivery.pickup: Self-pickup – collection of goods at the company's office within 3 working days after the order status changes to 'Available'.
cash_payment_details: Cash payment is available at the retail store checkout when picking up the ordered goods.
Payment is made in the national currency 'tenge'.
A sales receipt is issued upon receipt of payment.
payment_delivery.card_payment_on_receipt: Payment by Bank Card upon Receipt:
card_payment_on_receipt_details: Payment by bank card is available at the retail store checkout when picking up the ordered goods.
payment_delivery.card_payment_online: Payment by Bank Card on the Website when Placing an Order
card_payment_online_details: This payment method involves payment by bank card. Cards from almost any bank of the Visa and MasterCard systems are accepted for payment, provided that your issuing bank allows financial transactions on the Internet.

Attention! Not all bank cards initially support online payments. To find out if your card supports financial transactions on the Internet, consult your bank representative. Usually, if the card does not have this option, it can be activated by submitting a relevant application to your bank. Activation is done once. Please contact your bank for details.

The system will automatically redirect you to the electronic payment page of ePay by JSC 'People's Bank of Kazakhstan' to enter your card details. Please follow the instructions on the page. Once you are sure that the fields with the bank card details and email address are filled in correctly, click the 'Pay' button. A notification about the payment will be sent to the email address entered on this page. By default, the 'Your email address' field is pre-filled with the email address used during registration on the online store website. You can change the email address for receiving notifications. After completing the payment, you can leave this page or return to the online store by clicking the appropriate button.

public_offer.title: PUBLIC OFFER CONTRACT
public_offer.subtitle: For the Remalux.kz Online Store
public_offer.intro: This contract between the remalux.kz online store, hereinafter referred to as the 'Online Store/Seller', and the user of the online store services, hereinafter referred to as the 'Buyer', determines the terms of purchasing goods through the online store website.

terms.title: TERMS AND DEFINITIONS
terms.buyer: Buyer — any legally capable individual who orders and purchases goods by placing an order on the website.
terms.seller: Seller — K-COLOR LLP (BIN 010440005708), an organization that sells goods remotely under a retail sale contract based on the Buyer's familiarity with the offer on the Seller's website at remalux.kz.
terms.store: Online Store — A website owned by the Seller where goods are offered for sale to Buyers, along with payment and delivery conditions.
terms.product: Product — A tangible item offered for sale on the Site and available at the time of order confirmation.
terms.order: Order — A duly completed request by the Buyer for delivery of a list of goods to the specified address selected on the Site.
terms.account: Personal Account — A personalized page for the Buyer on the Site, requiring login and password, where Buyer information and orders are stored.
terms.delivery_service: Delivery Service — A third party providing delivery services for Orders to Buyers under a contract with the Seller.

general_provisions.title: 1. GENERAL PROVISIONS
general_provisions.item1: By ordering goods through the Online Store, the Buyer agrees to the Terms of Sale of Goods set forth below.
general_provisions.item2: These Terms and the information about the Product presented on the Site constitute a public offer in accordance with Article 395 of the Civil Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan, and by accepting these terms, the individual who accepts this offer makes payment for the Seller's Product under this Contract.
general_provisions.item3: The relationship between the Buyer and the Seller is governed by the provisions of the Civil Code of the Republic of Kazakhstan, the Law of the Republic of Kazakhstan dated May 4, 2010 No. 274-IV 'On Consumer Protection', and other regulatory legal acts of the Republic of Kazakhstan.
general_provisions.item4: The Seller reserves the right to make changes to these Terms, and the Buyer agrees to regularly monitor changes in the 'Public Offer Contract' section.
general_provisions.item5: The Buyer agrees to the Terms by clicking the 'Place Order' button at the final stage of placing an Order on the Site.

registration.title: 2. REGISTRATION ON THE WEBSITE
registration.item1: To place an order, the Buyer is recommended to register on the Site.
registration.item2: The Seller is not responsible for the accuracy and correctness of the information provided by the Buyer during registration.
registration.item3: The Buyer undertakes not to disclose the login and password provided during registration of the personal account to third parties. In case the Buyer suspects that their login and password may be compromised or used without authorization, the Buyer is obliged to notify the Seller via the feedback form.

order_placement.title: 3. ORDER PLACEMENT AND COMPLETION TIME
order_placement.item1: The Buyer's order can be placed in the following ways: accepted by phone or placed independently by the Buyer on the Site.
order_placement.item2: When placing an order, the Buyer must provide the following information: Buyer's or Recipient's full name, delivery address, contact email, phone number, delivery method, payment method.
order_placement.item3: The Seller has the right to refuse to conclude a contract and place an order without stating the reasons.
order_placement.item4: The order completion time is from one working day and may be negotiated individually depending on the characteristics and quantity of the Product.
order_placement.item5: The information materials on the Site are for reference purposes only and may not fully convey information about the Product.

delivery.title: 4. DELIVERY
delivery.item1: Delivery methods of goods are agreed upon by the Buyer with the online store manager.
delivery.item2: Orders are delivered to the address specified by the Buyer or picked up from the store.
delivery.item3: The Seller will make efforts to meet delivery deadlines, but delays due to circumstances beyond the Seller's control are possible.
delivery.item4: The risk of accidental loss or damage to the Product passes to the Buyer from the moment the Order is transferred and the signature is received in the documents.
delivery.item5: The cost of delivery for each Order is calculated individually and indicated at the final stage of placing the Order.

price_payment.title: 5. PRODUCT PRICE AND PAYMENT
price_payment.item1: The price of the Product in the online store is indicated in tenge.
price_payment.item2: The Seller has the right to change the price of the Product unilaterally, but the price for the paid Product cannot be changed.
price_payment.item3: The price of the Product is indicated at the final stage of placing the Order and is valid at the moment of clicking the 'Place Order' button.
price_payment.item4: The payment methods for the Product are indicated on the Site. The Buyer can pay for the order using any available method.

returns.title: 6. RETURN OF PRODUCTS AND REFUNDS
returns.item1: The return of goods of proper quality is possible within 14 days of receipt, provided that the product's appearance and documents confirming the purchase are preserved.
returns.item2: The return of goods of improper quality is possible in case of defects found, no later than 3 months before the product's expiration date.
returns.item3: Refunds are made to the bank card used for the Order.

copyright.title: 7. COPYRIGHT
copyright.content: All materials presented on the Site are the property of K-COLOR LLP and are protected by copyright law. Materials are intended for personal, non-commercial use and may not be used without the Seller's written permission.

warranty.title: 8. WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY
warranty.content: The Seller is not liable for damages caused to the Buyer as a result of improper use of the Products. Any arising disputes are resolved through negotiations or in court in accordance with the legislation of the Republic of Kazakhstan.

confidentiality.title: 9. CONFIDENTIALITY AND PROTECTION OF PERSONAL INFORMATION
confidentiality.content: The Seller undertakes not to disclose the Buyer's personal data. The Buyer may withdraw consent to the processing of personal data through the feedback form on the Site.

footer.content: Detailed information can be found on the official website: remalux.kz.

download_remalux.title: Remalux
download_remalux.description: Visualize your idea with our app! Just point the camera at the wall and select a color to see how it comes to life in real time. A great way to choose the perfect shade and imagine how your interior will look!

about_us.title: Create the Perfect Coating with Remalux Paints!
about_us.description: K-COLOR LLP under the REMALUX brand offers high-quality paints of European standards at an affordable price. Our company, located in the Republic of Kazakhstan, is a leading manufacturer of paints, produced under a British license. We are proud of our wide range of products, made from raw materials from the best manufacturers in France, Belgium, Germany, the Netherlands, and the USA.

park.title: Our Fleet: Fast and Reliable Delivery
park.text: Our products are designed to easily meet the requirements of the most demanding professionals for use on prestigious, high-profile projects. Additionally, they are perfect for everyday people selecting materials for home use and carrying out DIY cosmetic repairs.
